breakfast.name: Mexican Breakfast Burrito
breakfast.description: A hearty burrito filled with scrambled eggs, black beans, avocado, salsa, and cheese wrapped in a whole wheat tortilla.

lunch.name: Grilled Chicken Tacos
lunch.description: Soft corn tortillas filled with grilled chicken, fresh cilantro, diced onions, and a squeeze of lime, served with a side of pico de gallo.

dinner.name: Italian Quinoa Bowl
dinner.description: A nutritious bowl of quinoa topped with roasted vegetables, chickpeas, and a drizzle of balsamic glaze, garnished with fresh basil.

items.name: Greek Yogurt with Honey
items.description: Creamy Greek yogurt drizzled with honey and topped with mixed nuts for added crunch.

items.name: Protein Shake
items.description: A post-workout shake made with whey protein, almond milk, and a banana for a quick energy boost.

breakfast.name: Indian Masala Omelette
breakfast.description: A spicy omelette made with eggs, tomatoes, onions, and green chilies, served with whole grain toast.

lunch.name: Chickpea Salad
lunch.description: A refreshing salad with chickpeas, cucumber, tomatoes, red onion, and a lemon-tahini dressing.

dinner.name: Pasta Primavera
dinner.description: Whole wheat pasta tossed with seasonal vegetables, olive oil, garlic, and topped with parmesan cheese.

items.name: Almonds
items.description: A handful of raw almonds for a healthy fat and protein boost.

items.name: Cottage Cheese with Pineapple
items.description: Low-fat cottage cheese mixed with fresh pineapple chunks for a sweet and protein-rich snack.

breakfast.name: Breakfast Quesadilla
breakfast.description: A delicious quesadilla filled with scrambled eggs, cheese, and spinach, served with salsa on the side.

lunch.name: Lentil Curry with Rice
lunch.description: A hearty lentil curry served with brown rice and a side of steamed broccoli.

dinner.name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
dinner.description: Bell peppers stuffed with ground turkey, quinoa, black beans, and topped with cheese, baked to perfection.

items.name: Hummus with Carrot Sticks
items.description: Creamy hummus served with crunchy carrot sticks for a healthy snack.

items.name: Protein Bar
items.description: A homemade protein bar packed with oats, nuts, and protein powder for a quick energy boost.

breakfast.name: Italian Frittata
breakfast.description: A baked frittata with eggs, spinach, tomatoes, and mozzarella cheese, served with whole grain toast.

lunch.name: Chicken Caesar Salad
lunch.description: Grilled chicken breast on a bed of romaine lettuce, topped with parmesan cheese, croutons, and Caesar dressing.

dinner.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry with Tofu
dinner.description: A colorful stir-fry of mixed vegetables and tofu, served over brown rice with a soy sauce glaze.

items.name: Peanut Butter Banana Toast
items.description: Whole grain toast topped with peanut butter and banana slices for a quick energy boost.

items.name: Trail Mix
items.description: A mix of nuts, seeds, and dried fruits for a healthy and satisfying snack.

breakfast.name: Chilaquiles
breakfast.description: Crispy tortilla chips topped with green salsa, scrambled eggs, avocado, and cheese, served with a side of beans.

lunch.name: Quinoa and Black Bean Bowl
lunch.description: A nourishing bowl of quinoa, black beans, corn, diced tomatoes, and avocado, drizzled with lime dressing.

dinner.name: Baked Salmon with Asparagus
dinner.description: Oven-baked salmon fillet served with roasted asparagus and a side of quinoa.

items.name: Protein Smoothie
items.description: A smoothie made with protein powder, spinach, banana, and almond milk for a nutritious snack.

items.name: Rice Cakes with Almond Butter
items.description: Rice cakes spread with almond butter and topped with banana slices for a crunchy snack.

breakfast.name: Savory Oatmeal with Eggs
breakfast.description: Oatmeal cooked with spinach and topped with a poached egg and sriracha for a spicy kick.

lunch.name: Paneer Tikka Wrap
lunch.description: Grilled paneer marinated in spices, wrapped in a whole wheat tortilla with lettuce and mint chutney.

dinner.name: Shrimp Tacos with Mango Salsa
dinner.description: Soft tacos filled with grilled shrimp, fresh mango salsa, and avocado, served with lime wedges.

items.name: Cottage Cheese with Berries
items.description: Low-fat cottage cheese topped with fresh berries for a sweet and protein-rich snack.

items.name: Nut Butter Energy Balls
items.description: Homemade energy balls made with oats, nut butter, and honey for a quick snack.

breakfast.name: Egg and Avocado Toast
breakfast.description: Whole grain toast topped with smashed avocado, poached eggs, and a sprinkle of chili flakes.

lunch.name: Mediterranean Couscous Salad
lunch.description: Couscous mixed with cherry tomatoes, cucumber, olives, feta cheese, and a lemon-olive oil dressing.

dinner.name: Chicken Biryani
dinner.description: A fragrant rice dish made with marinated chicken, basmati rice, and aromatic spices, served with raita.

items.name: Dark Chocolate Almonds
items.description: Almonds coated in dark chocolate for a sweet and satisfying treat.

items.name: Fruit Smoothie
items.description: A refreshing smoothie made with mixed fruits and yogurt for a nutritious snack.
